title: Andrea19
author: Andrea19
content: Be part of the next revolution! Electric Vehicles, Smart charging stations, NFTs and tokenized Super & Classic cars under one umbrella: EDriveTokenOur mission is the development of initiatives related to the automotive sector from its different perspectives, involving people interested in supporting the revolution represented by electric vehicles, lovers of classic cars as well as of supercars.We have the real possibility to develop this project by leveraging the innovation represented by the Blockchain, which can really lead to the definition of a completely digital New Economy.NDF Solutions LTD was established in 2021 in the UK and its core business is the development of projects related to DLT (Distributed Ledger Technology) and Blockchain. We research and develop solutions capable of blending the real and digital economy together, with particular attention to the developments of the Sectors most affected by Technological Innovation, such as those of Energy and Automotive, using all the tools of DeFi (Decentralized Finance) to offer everyone has the opportunity to participate in highly innovative and profitable projects.https://www.edrivetoken.io/Social pages:Medium: https://medium.com/@EDriveToken.ioTelegram: https://t.me/edrivetokenTwitter:https://twitter.com/EDriveToken
